description:
In the old days, political alliances were often forged with marriage. After Oda Nobunaga`s sister, Oichi, married Azai Nagamasa they had three daughters who would go on to live turbulent lives.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oichi and the Three Azai Sisters! The Great Marriage Strategy
Oichi to Azai San Shimai, Yomeiri Daisakusen!
お市と浅井三姉妹, 嫁入り大作戦!
